author: aldcroft
description: Andrea Zonca writes:I've developed a quaternion library using numpy with the purpose of manipulating large arrays of quaternions, as typically used for spacecraft pointing (I work on Planck).  The code is available atgithub.com/zonca/quaternionarrayI would like some feedback, I might add some documentation in the near future, now I've only docstrings.
title: Quaternion library - looking for feedback
